pullrequest.title: Added an IndexedMzML class to make random access of indexed MzML documents possible.

content.raw:
Do you mean that we just reassign the names?
In that case we can't get rid of the IndexedXML name, because it is used in `super` calls. 
But, since XML is not expected to be used by end users and is backwards compatible (even more so if we do ``use_index = kwargs.get("use_index", False)``), we can also just make `MzML` and others inherit directly from IndexedXML. What do you think?
content.html: Do you mean that we just reassign the names? In that case we can't get rid of the IndexedXML name, because it is used in super calls. But, since XML is not expected to be used by end users and is backwards compatible (even more so if we do use_index = kwargs.get("use_index", False)), we can also just make MzML and others inherit directly from IndexedXML. What do you think?
